events.message: I received the phone I ordered yesterday, but the screen is cracked on arrival and it doesn’t work properly.
The issue has been identified as a product defect related to a broken screen and malfunction.
Your case has been assigned to one of our agents specialized in product defects for further assistance.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the damage to your phone. I’ll help you get this sorted out as quickly as possible.
Could you please send us photos of the cracked screen and the packaging it came in to help verify the damage?
I have attached several photos showing the cracked screen and the condition of the box when I received the phone.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement phone or a full refund. Which option would you prefer?
I would prefer to receive a replacement phone rather than a refund, thank you for the quick response.
We have processed your replacement order and sent you the tracking information. Expect delivery within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure the replacement phone arrived safely and is functioning well. Please let us know if you have any issues.
The replacement arrived today and works perfectly. Thank you for your help and quick processing!
We are glad everything is resolved. Closing your case now. Feel free to contact us again if needed.
We have sent you a survey to rate your support experience. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
